message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's a unique opportunity that aligns perfectly with your company's needs, and I'm confident it could significantly boost your profits.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1,650,000. This represents a substantial investment, but I am certain the returns will be worth it.  Let's schedule a time to discuss the details further and I can provide you with all the information you need to make a decision.
